_A_FIELDSET_CHILDREN_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTI: This page covers the use of children in the AFieldset component, as well as related properties such as class-column for customizing the classes of individual child elements, class-columns for the parent container, and errors-all for displaying child element errors.
_A_FIELDSET_CHILDREN_GROUP_TREE_DESCRIPT: This example demonstrates the ability to create a nested element structure of unlimited depth using the AFieldset component. Each child element can contain its own nested elements, allowing flexible data structure and rendering control. For example, here, the first and second fieldset contain their own child elements such as text fields and checkboxes.
